Package com.prms.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.prms.controller.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class is a Spring MVC controller that handles requests related to user operations. It provides methods for user registration, login, appointment booking, payment processing, and other user-related functionalities. This class manages the interaction between the user interface and the backend services.
Since:
05/05/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
ARAVINDKUMAR SATHYASAI BOBBA

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping public List<User> getUsers()
      Retrieves the list of all users.
      Returns:
      List of User objects representing all users in the system.

    • userDashBoard

      @RequestMapping("/index") public String userDashBoard(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      Displays the user index page.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      principal - The Principal object representing the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The view name for the user home page.

    • patientAppointment

      @RequestMapping("/appointment") public String patientAppointment(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      Displays the appointment booking page for the user.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      principal - The Principal object representing the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The view name for the appointment booking page.

    • createAppointmant

      @PostMapping("/appAppointment") public String createAppointmant(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("userid") Integer userid, @RequestParam("fullname") String fullname, @RequestParam("selGender") String gender, @RequestParam("age") String age, @RequestParam("appoint_date") String date, @RequestParam("email") String email, @RequestParam("phno") String phoneNo, @RequestParam("diseases") String diseases, @RequestParam("doctorName") String doctorName, @RequestParam("address") String address, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Processes the appointment booking request.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      userid - The ID of the user making the appointment.
      fullname - The full name of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      email - The email address of the user.
      phoneNo - The phone number of the user.
      diseases - The diseases or symptoms provided by the user.
      doctorName - The name of the selected doctor.
      address - The address of the user.
      session - The HttpSession object used to store session attributes.
      Returns:
      The view name for the appointment booking page.

    • createOrder

      @PostMapping("/create_order") @ResponseBody public String createOrder(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> data, Principal principal) throws Exception
      Creates a new order for the payment using Razorpay.
      Parameters:
      data - The request body containing the payment details.
      principal - The Principal object representing the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The JSON response containing the order details.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the order creation process.

    • updateTransaction

      @PostMapping("/update_order") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateTransaction(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> data)
      Updates the transaction details after successful payment.
      Parameters:
      data - The request body containing the updated transaction details.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the response message.

    • updateAppointment

      @PostMapping("/update-app/{id}") public String updateAppointment(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      Updates an appointment with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to be updated.
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      principal - The Principal object representing the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The view name for updating the appointment.

    • updateAppointmant

      @PostMapping("/updateAppointment") public String updateAppointmant(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("userid") Integer userid, @RequestParam("fullname") String fullname, @RequestParam("selGender") String gender, @RequestParam("age") String age, @RequestParam("appoint_date") String date, @RequestParam("email") String email, @RequestParam("phno") String phoneNo, @RequestParam("diseases") String diseases, @RequestParam("doctorName") String doctorName, @RequestParam("address") String address, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates the appointment details based on the submitted form data.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      userid - The ID of the user associated with the appointment.
      fullname - The full name of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      age - The age of the patient.
      date - The appointment date.
      email - The email address of the patient.
      phoneNo - The phone number of the patient.
      diseases - The diseases or symptoms reported by the patient.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor for the appointment.
      address - The address of the patient.
      session - The HttpSession object used to store session attributes.
      Returns:
      The view name for the updated appointment or a redirect to the appointment listing page.
